Articles.Content: That looks really cool Slew, but please dont override the old Mei long, make it so we can have all 3 differet Down Under capsules
Looks great! I was affraid that you\'d replace the Mei Long. Since we will get docking in 0.15 is there a chance that you\'ll make a docking port for the capsule?
Awesome!!
Smart idea.
I absolutely love this pack. So bright and colorful. The Mei Long is especially awesome!

You\'re the first pack I went to the Mun with.

I. Need. You.

Heheh.

Awesome job.

Yeesh. That Ausplane is a tough bugger. I can\'t destroy it if I TRY

Gonna try crashing it into the moon now.

I have a question/comment on the 2m motor provided. Namely it wobbles as jelly when it\'s holding up the stack. Suggestions/Question: Fix the cfg for the next release and what value(s) should I change to make it so?

I have a question/comment on the 2m motor provided. Namely it wobbles as jelly when it\'s holding up the stack. Suggestions/Question: Fix the cfg for the next release and what value(s) should I change to make it so?

Yeah, that bug annoys me.

I think it got worse when I did the CoG changes back in 0.1.2, so I\'m going to try moving the CoG around to see what happens.

I noticed that the Mei Long capsule resembles the SpaceX Dragon capsule. Mei Long means 'beautiful dragon' in mandarin.

Coincidence? I think NOT!

I noticed that the Mei Long capsule resembles the SpaceX Dragon capsule. Mei Long means 'beautiful dragon' in mandarin.

Coincidence? I think NOT!

Slew! Y u no add landing gear to shuttle?!

8)

You really love those legs, don\'t you?

Unfortunately, landing legs can only pivot about one axis as far as I can see.

Otherwise I\'d be updating the hell out of the Mei Long LLV (which is supposed to have folding/telescoping legs).

I know it\'s been a long time since you posted this, but just wanted to let you know that I\'ve made a plugin that allows telescoping/rotating/folding/moving in any way you want/ landing legs.

I know it\'s been a long time since you posted this, but just wanted to let you know that I\'ve made a plugin that allows telescoping/rotating/folding/moving in any way you want/ landing legs.

You\'re my hero, sarkun.

You\'re my hero, sarkun.

Yay! Give me a shout when you want to give this thing a go, I\'ll help with the animating and cfg editing.

I know it\'s been a long time since you posted this, but just wanted to let you know that I\'ve made a plugin that allows telescoping/rotating/folding/moving in any way you want/ landing legs.

Just imagine the possibilities!

Landing legs on the Mei Long, working cargo bay doors on the Ausplane, so much more......

Sarkun, you win and rightfully deserve the whole internet. Have fun.

Hey slew, I\'m having some troubles with the AUSPLANE launch vehicle, it keeps tilting to the right during launch...

Anyway, fantastic job!

I noticed that the Mei Long capsule resembles the SpaceX Dragon capsule. Mei Long means 'beautiful dragon' in mandarin.

Coincidence? I think NOT!

Did you notice that the Ausplane launch vehicle looks like an SpaceX Falcon Heavy?

)
This is my first time watching that party supplies can be so expensive as well.
Hum, some winglets and silvertape solved the tilting problem... Slew, it is possible to create a space capsule with built-in parachutes? And a parachute part that open 3 parachutes at the same time?

Hum, some winglets and silvertape solved the tilting problem... Slew, it is possible to create a space capsule with built-in parachutes? And a parachute part that open 3 parachutes at the same time?

You can make a capsule look like it has built-in parachutes, but it still has to be a separate part.

A part that opens 3 parachutes is pretty easy, and it\'s been done before (someone else can probably find a link).

I was going to do a parachute part for 0.5, except mine was going to be a bunch of balloons.

---

By the way, I know it\'s been a long time since the last Down Under update. Don\'t worry, I haven\'t forgotten KSP!

I\'ve just been busy on another project on iPhone.

my eyes cannot unsee the awesomeness :\'(

Thank You for such a wonderful addon.
Don\'t mind me, I\'m just cruising through Kerbin\'s asteroid belt.

One day, the capsules will have built-in parachutes and floaters, and parachutes will be a bunch of balloons...

Oh, dreams of the human Kerbal imagination... :

I don\'t think capsules will ever have inbuilt floats and parachutes. They should always be addon parts and the solution should be that modders create their capsules with the appropriate parts just as the Squad team will certainly add a functional heat shield once reentry heat is added for the default capsule. The point of KSP to date has been maximum flexibility, I think keeping parachutes, reentry shields, and stuff like that modules is the best way because it lets people use their preferences in how they design their ships.
